levels.name: Basic Move
levels.title: Level 1: Basic Movement
levels.description: Learn how to move pieces. Move allows a piece to move to any adjacent cell.
levels.objective: Move the red piece to any adjacent position

levels.name: Jump Escape
levels.title: Level 2: Jump Over Pieces
levels.description: Jump allows a piece to jump over any adjacent piece. Help the blue piece escape from the red pieces' encirclement.
levels.objective: Move the blue piece out of the red pieces' encirclement

levels.name: Span Calculation
levels.title: Level 3: Span Calculation
levels.description: Use span calculation to move pieces. Move red piece 8 to the right of red piece 9.
levels.objective: Move piece 8, complete the calculation so the result equals 8

levels.name: Continuous Span
levels.title: Level 4: Continuous Span Calculation
levels.description: Use continuous span calculation. Move red piece 1 to the right of blue piece 6.
levels.objective: Calculate so that both paths have the same value
